Player History
Drafted in 9th round, 141st overall pick, by St. Louis (C) in 2015...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/1/2015, off Charles Bodkin (COL)...
Injured on 7/8/2015 with a Fractured Hand, out for 3-4 weeks...
Won World Series with St. Louis (C) in 2015...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
